structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Crimes Against Chastity, Morality, Decency And Good Order

law.catch_line: Inducing Person Under Eighteen To Have Sexual Intercourse
law.text: Whoever induces any person under 18 years of age of chaste life to have unlawful sexual intercourse shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than three years or in a jail or house of correction for not more than two and one-half years or by a fine of not more than $1,000 or by both such fine and imprisonment.
